com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class BoatRace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.BoatRace

  • public class BoatRace
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a BoatRace. Call functionality for sprite objects such as boats and obstacles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoatRace

        public BoatRace(java.util.List<Boat> raceBoats)
        Main constructor for a BoatRace.

        Initialises lists of boats and obstacles as well as the colour of the Time Elapsed Overlay.

        Parameters:
        raceBoats - List of Boat A list of ai boats and the player boat.

    • Method Detail

      • runStep

        public void runStep()
        Main method called for BoatRace.

        This method is the main game loop that checks if any boats have started or finished a leg and calls the update methods for the movements for player boat and AI boats obstacles. Also this method checks for collisions.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()

      • getSprites

        public java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getSprites()
        Returns a list of all sprites in the PixelBoat game including boats and obstacles.
        Returns:
        List of Sprites A list of all sprites in the PixelBoat game.

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Calculates and displays the Time Elapsed Overlay for player boat from the start of a leg.

        The displayed time is updated in real-time and the position is consistent with the player hud (i.e. stamina and durability bar positions).

        Parameters:
        batch - batch to draw to

      • drawTimeDisplay

        public void drawTimeDisplay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                            Boat b,
                            java.lang.String labelText,
                            long time,
                            float x,
                            float y)
        Draws the a time display on the screen.
        Parameters:
        batch - SpriteBatch instance
        b - Boat instance
        labelText - label for text. If "" empty string passed in then default time display shown.
        time - time to be shown in milliseconds
        x - horizontal position of display
        y - vertical position of display

      • drawLegTimeDisplay

        public void drawLegTimeDisplay(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                               Boat b)
        Draws a leg time display on the screen when the given boat has completed a leg of the race.

        This function gets the leg times list for the given boat instance, gets the last updated leg time and formats a leg time display string which shows which leg was completed and in what time. The function then passes on the drawing of this formatted leg time display to drawTimeDisplay.

        Parameters:
        batch - SpriteBatch instance
        b - Boat instance

      • estimateEndTimes

        public void estimateEndTimes()
        Estimates the times for all boats at the end of a race. It also sets the boats to the finished state. The race is also set to finished.
